data.text: @tanner_1967 @louisvillemayor Agreed, is so sad what he has done to our city. I don't think leadership is the word you are looking for.
@louisvillemayor Your leadership is one of the greatest challenges this city has faced in modern history.

Shout out to Kentucky Nurses Association, Americana, Office for Globalization, La Casita Center, Somali Community of Louisville, See Forward Ministries for all you've done to protect people against COVID-19. And, of course, our @LouMetroHealth.
